pages.title: Mirror Give Up
pages.text: This Chant is the last hope for travellers stuck in the $(l:dimensions/mirror)Mirror$(/l) dimension, and will teleport back the lost traveller to their spawn location. This Chant only works in the aforementioned dimension. The cooldown is much longer than the $(l:artifacts/chants/mirror_send_me_home)Send me Home$(/l) Chant.
